svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/128.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="24.7.17" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="scenario 3" id="QnenuQoxBZ-la8eciHlc"> <mxGraphModel dx="1434" dy="1268" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-0" /> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-0" /> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-2" value="kubernetes cluster" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;verticalAlign=bottom;fillColor=none;fontColor=#333333;strokeColor=default;shadow=0;dashed=1;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="170" y="150" width="500" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-3" value="Envoy" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="220.56" y="180" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-4" value="Keycloak" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="399.99999999999994" y="180" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-5" value="<ul style="padding-left: 20px;"><li>Gets client certificate from XFCC header.</li><li><font color="#ff0000">Malicious cluster internal client </font>is recognized as authenticated using the <font color="#ff0000">identity</font> <font color="#ff0000">from forged certificate.</font></li></ul>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=14;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=left;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="570" y="175" width="290" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-6" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1.025;entryY=0.617;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;endArrow=none;endFill=0;dashed=1;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" source="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-5" target="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="331.56" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320.56" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" source="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-8" target="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-8" value="<font color="#ff0000">malicious client<br>with forged client cert</font>" style="shape=umlActor;verticalLabelPosition=bottom;verticalAlign=top;html=1;outlineConnect=0;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="570" y="280" width="30" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-9" value="<div>Client could potentially connect also from any Kubernetes namespace if network policies allow.</div>" style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=14;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=center;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="630" y="270" width="280" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-10" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.3333333333333333;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;endArrow=none;endFill=0;dashed=1;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" target="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-8" edge="1" source="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-9"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="400" y="310" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="571" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-3_oFp5JjqqM9jDzUQVo-0" value="Request with <font color="#ff0000">forged client cert</font> in XFCC header." style="shape=note;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;backgroundOutline=1;darkOpacity=0.05;size=14;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;align=center;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="264.49" width="160" height="45.51" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="-3_oFp5JjqqM9jDzUQVo-1" style="rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=none;endFill=0;dashed=1;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=160;entryDy=29.755;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="dX0drYrlE5mkWf2W3GAj-1" </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

ul.li: Gets client certificate from XFCC header.
Malicious cluster internal client is recognized as authenticated using the identity from forged certificate.
